summary: So, I was going through my old sketchbooks and drawing pads the other night and I found some old art from post Interactive...
body:
So, I was going through my old sketchbooks and drawing pads the other night and I found some old art from post Interactive Introverts that I never finished. So I decided to fix a few things and finish it.

So yee, I hope you like it 🖤

@amazingphil @danielhowell
